Treatment of hypohidrotic ectodermal dysplasia may include special hair care formulas or wigs, measures to prevent overheating, removal of ear and nose concretions, and dental evaluations and treatment (e.g., restorations, dental implants, or dentures).",GARD,Hypohidrotic ectodermal dysplasia
How to diagnose Hypohidrotic ectodermal dysplasia ?,"Is genetic testing available for hypohidrotic ectodermal dysplasia? Yes.
